availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David P. Gee (Carter County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Gee. Father of Martha Gee, Champness Gee, Mary Gee, Robert Gee, Rintha Gee, Macager Gee, David Gee, Matilda Gee, William Gee, Dudley A. Gee, and Elizabeth Gee. Farmer in Carter County in 1850. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 2, p. 243A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 217.
Find A Grave, "David Palmer Lee (1813-1861)," Memorial #113373978 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/113373978 (accessed January 22, 2020).
